Ice Road Trackers

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on September 14, 2020

A trek toward Icewind Dale turns deadly when an avalanche blocks the heroes’ passage through the Spine of the World. Rescued by a menagerie of strange creatures, the heroes are asked to return the favor in exchange for answers about what’s happening in the cold and frozen North.

item.title: CCC-ODFC03-03 - The Cause of All Life's Problems
item.description: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Marble Elephant), Tankard of Sobriety, a scroll, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Cause of All Life's Problems

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released on July 19, 2020

Riswyn Rumnaheim, a young female dwarf, has recently discovered that her sister has survived the Rage of Demons, but alas, this sister has been tainted by the Abyssal presence of the demon that owns her soul. She is on the lookout for adventurers to help her remove the taint, allowing her to recover at least some of the family that she lost. The characters will discover how to cleanse the soul and in so doing put down a rising evil that may threaten the surface.

Items

  • Figurine of Wondrous Power (Marble Elephant) Rare
  • Tankard of Sobriety Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Locate Object Uncommon

Story Awards

Friend of the Clan Rumnaheim

As a Friend of Clan Rumnaheim, you can request entrance to the Earthspur Mines and Town, even if they are currently closed to outsiders. If Riswyn, new head of Clan Rumnaheim, is present at the mines (at the discretion of the DM), she can vouchsafe your good behavior and have you granted entrance. If you abuse this trust (at the discretion of the DM), void this story award.

Honorary Member of Clan Rumnaheim

You are considered an honorary member of the Rumnaheim clan. On your interactions within the Earthspur Mines and Town you are considered a dwarf, even if you are of a different race. For better or for worse.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON6-1 - A Reopened Eye
item.description: Enduring Spellbook, Fey Cloak of Protection, a spellbook, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
A Reopened Eye

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 3, 2020

Conflicts arising in both the Feywild and the Prime have caused some in both planes to call for a return of the Balance, and for new alliances between the fey and mortals. A seer new to the Moonshaes has prophesied your help in opening a new portal between these worlds. Part 1 of the Earthmother’s Eye trilogy.

Items

  • Enduring Spellbook Common
  • Fey Cloak of Protection Uncommon

Spellbooks

  • The Tome of Anothas: absorb elements, alarm, cause fear, comprehend languages, detect magic, feather fall, mage armor, magic missile, alter self, dragon's breath, knock, magic weapon, mind spike, Nystul's magic aura, tongues, catnap, counterspell, Leomund's tiny hut, summon lesser demons, charm monster, Mordenkainen's faithful hound, enervation, hold monster, infernal calling, Rary's telepathic bond, and create homunculus

Story Awards

Ashoral’s Friendship

ou met with the guardian of the moonwell and resolved your differences peacefully, rather than resorting to violence. The druid guardian Ashoral considers you a friend, which may bear fruit at a later date.

Zanz’s Appreciation

You rescued Zanzantook from his fate of being devoured by animals enraged at his terrible poetry. Whether you like it or not, he considers you a friend. This friendship may bear fruit at a later date.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON6-2 - Troubled Visions
item.description: Eladrin Boots of Elvenkind, Moon-Touched Sword, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Troubled Visions

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 3, 2020

A newly opened moonwell proves unstable. An eladrin community in the Feywild calls for aid, as their home has been torn asunder and transformed by planar rifts. You must enter the moonwell to seal the rifts threatening the region before this instability pours over to the Prime Material. Part 2 of the Earthmother’s Eye trilogy.

Items

  • Eladrin Boots of Elvenkind Uncommon
  • Moon-Touched Sword Common

Story Awards

Mairin’s Debt

Mairin is deeply indebted to you for proving her lineage. She has travelled to many places and knows a good deal of people across Faerun. If you need an item or expert that isn’t easily obtained, she might be able to get it for you—given enough time.

Saviors of Temerity Bay

The adventurers saved a community of immortals from a troublesome peril; while it’s unlikely any eladrin or powerful fey will actually show up to help you if you ask, a spirit of the woods might allow you to pass, or a dire bear might decide to look elsewhere for a meal.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON6-3 - Planar Convergence
item.description: Horn of Silent Alarm, Javelin of Lightning, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Planar Convergence

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 3, 2020

After a moonwell portal is permanently opened to the Feywild, fey and humans have begun to live together in harmony. But when a new threat forms on the horizon, darkness threatens to overwhelm the moonwell and consume the Moonshae Isles. As the fey and human denizens rush to mount defenses, will their alliance be enough to defeat the coming army? Part 3 of the Earthmother’s Eye trilogy.

Items

  • Horn of Silent Alarm Common
  • Javelin of Lightning Uncommon

Story Awards

Asper the Jellyflumph

This tiny jellyfish is native to the Feywild, evidenced by its translucent body which strobes pastel colors that change with its mood. It floats through the skies as if the air was made of water. If killed or reduced to 0 hit points, the jellyflumph can be recalled via find familiar, and uses the statistics of a bat from the Monster Manual.

Critter Keeper

You’ve befriended the fey creatures that now inhabit Rushdown Wood. When traveling through the Rushdown Wood, you will find the creatures very helpful and often find them skittering around your feet or sitting on your shoulder.

item.title: CCC-TAROT-S1-01 - A Long Night
item.description: Immovable Rod, a potion, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
A Long Night

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on May 3, 2020

This is a simple caravan job—deliver the mysterious box to Thentia. Just one thing—don't open the box. And protect it from all attacks. A Side Story to the Song of Fates.

Items

  • Immovable Rod Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Fire Breath Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Scorching Ray Uncommon

item.title: CCC-NBDD01-02 - Where Can She Be?
item.description: Clockwork Amulet, Hat of Disguise, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Where Can She Be?

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on April 28, 2020

A master criminal has been making her way across the Moonsea, stealing priceless treasures at every stop. It's up to you to trace her steps, find her allies, and stop her before she can claim her final prize.

Items

  • Clockwork Amulet Common
  • Hat of Disguise Uncommon

Story Awards

Do It A Capella

You have performed with the traveling a capella kenku bard troupe, Roc Capella. Should you encounter them again, you will be welcome to join in their performance and are treated as part of the band.

item.title: DDAL09-15 - Maddening Screams
item.description: Helm of Telepathy, Red Dragon Scale Male, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Maddening Screams

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 3 Released on April 27, 2020

The final resting place of the Hellrider company known as the Bloody Hooves has been found. Unfortunately, the Canyon of Screams is well beyond the reach of safe haven, so you must protect Dara behind enemy lines with no one to count on but yourselves. Her holy mission, and your very souls, are at stake. Part One of the Doors and Corners series of adventures.

Items

  • Helm of Telepathy Uncommon
  • Red Dragon Scale Male Very Rare

Story Awards

Faith and Trust

You’ve successfully retrieved the wards of faithfulness from the resting place of the Bloody Hooves.

item.title: DDAL09-16 - Honors Unforseen
item.description: Fochlucan Bandore (Instrument of the Bards), Ioun Stone of Leadership, a potion, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Honors Unforseen

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 3 Released on April 27, 2020

Accompanying the Chosen of Ilmater and baring the newly discovered Ward of Faithfulness, you proceed further into the tomb of the Bloody Hooves. Time is running short. Zariel’s forces hunt for you even now. Part Two of the Doors and Corners series of adventures.

Items

  • Fochlucan Bandore (Instrument of the Bards) Uncommon
  • Ioun Stone of Leadership Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

You Let Dara Die

Dara has now died _______ times while in your care. Every time she dies, Dara loses one of the following abilities, chosen at random: Damage Resistances, Condition Immunities, Magic Resistance, and Innate Spellcasting. If she loses all four, she has lost all of her abilities as a Chosen and may no longer return Hellriders or angels to life.

In future adventures that she’s featured in, your group uses the average number of deaths among the characters for determining how many abilities she has lost.

item.title: DDAL09-17 - In the Hand
item.description: Bag of Holding, Wand of the War Mage, +3, 3 potions, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
In the Hand

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 3 Released on April 27, 2020

Your quest to return the Bloody Hooves is nearly at an end. Only the company’s commander remains and then you’ll be ready to ride to the rescue of fallen Elturel! Part Three of the Doors and Corners series of adventures.

Items

  • Bag of Holding Uncommon
  • Wand of the War Mage, +3 Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Speed Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Supreme Healing Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Vitality Very Rare
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Torm's Chosen

For nobly giving yourself so that High Priest of Torm Horst Atheraice could be freed, Torm blessed a piece of your soul. The expedition is in peril as the opposition has gained key intelligence from you before killing you.

After suffering torture at the hands of General Everbleed’s devils, you died and are reborn in any location of your choice in Faerûn that has a temple to Torm, and the next time you die, you gain this benefit as well (as if a greater resurrection).

item.title: CCC-TAROT-02-08 - Winding Road to Freedom
item.description: Mantle of Freedom (Cloak of Billowing), Trident of Fish Command, a potion, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Winding Road to Freedom

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on April 19, 2020

A small community has arisen among the asymptomatic inhabitants of the Forbidden Zone which has brought much needed stability to the area. However, that peace is being threatened by a raving religious zealot. Can the two sides find common ground, or is the Forbidden Zone destined to erupt in barbarity once more? Part Fifteen of Song of Fates.

Items

  • Mantle of Freedom (Cloak of Billowing) Common
  • Trident of Fish Command Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare

Story Awards

Tarot of Fate (The Hierophant): Inverted

You freed the Collective from their empathic bond. There will be increasing strife among the community in the near future, but it will be freely chosen strife.

Tarot of Fate (The Hierophant): Upright

You did not remove the empathic link binding the Collective together. They will continue to a harmonious unit, even during the dark days to come.

item.title: CCC-TAROT-02-09 - The Thentia Job
item.description: a spellbook and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Thentia Job

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on April 19, 2020

Deep in Karasht Silverflame’s vault is an item that can control the infected Thentia citizens. Is he storing it for safekeeping or does he have sinister plans? The Selunites have tasked you with retrieving the item and finding out Karasht's plans. Part Sixteen of Song of Fates.

Spellbooks

  • Karasht’s Spellbook: expeditious retreat, feather fall, jump, longstrider, alter self, rope trick, spider climb, blink, fly, haste, fabricate, polymorph, stoneshape, animate object, passwall, and telekinesis

Story Awards

Tarot of Fate (Strength): Inverted

You retrieved the Woad heart from the Vault but did not hand it over to Kialila. Who knows what will become of the infected populace.

Tarot of Fate (Strength): Upright

You retrieved the Woad heart from the Vault and handed it over to Kialila. No doubt that the infected of Thentia are that much closer to a cure.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON5-1 - Bloodlust Rising
item.description: Admantine Chain Mail and 2 potions
item.content:encoded:
Bloodlust Rising

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on April 13, 2020

When it was just livestock, few took note. When people disappeared, things changed. Now farmsteads are burning and bloodthirsty cackling echo through the hills of old Gnarhelm in northern Alaron. The farmers are defenseless against such bloodlust; can heroes help? Part 1 of the Tides of Blood trilogy, set in the Moonshae Isles.

Items

  • Admantine Chain Mail Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Giant Strength (Hill) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

item.content:encoded:
Bloodlust Contained

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on April 13, 2020

An unexpected enemy has appeared, attacking with ferocious bloodlust and unknown purpose. The locals can’t defend against this threat forever; heroes are needed to discover who is responsible for the attacks and stop them for good. Part 2 of the Tides of Blood trilogy, set in the Moonshae Isles.

  • Brooch of Shielding Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Hallucinatory Terrain Rare

item.content:encoded:
Bloodlust Tempered

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on April 13, 2020

With the marauders gone, peace returns to northern Alaron, but somebody brought the reavers across the straits of Moonshae to Alaron. They need to be stopped before the recent troubles become nothing more than the vanguard of something worse. Part 3 of the Tides of Blood trilogy, set in the Moonshae Isles.

Items

  • Ring of Mind-Shielding Uncommon
  • 2 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

item.title: DDAL-EBEP-01 - The Iron Giant
item.description: Lantern of Revealing, Rope of Climbing, Shield, +1, a potion, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Iron Giant

Oracle of War Epic for Tier 1 Released on April 6, 2020

In this epic event, Cultists of the Emerald Claw reanimate a warforged colossus from the battlefields outside Salvation and turn it against the outpost. The scavengers in town must work together to disable the titan limb-by-limb and save the outpost from annihilation. They are aided throughout by the Oracle of War, which provides vital tactical advice alongside cryptic verses from the Draconic Prophecy.

Items

  • Lantern of Revealing Uncommon
  • Rope of Climbing Uncommon
  • Shield, +1 Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

Story Awards

Death is a Door

You died defending Salvation from its enemies. Mysterious forces brought you back to life, but you don’t know who they were or how they wielded such powerful magic.

Fallen Titan

The warforged colossus Big Moe was defeated. One of the salvage brokers, Irrulan Karnach, fled town just before the attack. Could she have been involved somehow?

If you’re interested in tailing Karnach you can invest 200gp after this adventure into tracking her down. You discover a lead that she’s headed to Sharn. If you visit Sharn in a future adventure, you can locate her for questioning.

item.title: CCC-TRI-26 ROSE1-1 - Touch the Stars
item.description: Shadowneedle (Unbreakable Arrow), Shoes of the Glacier Walker (Boots of Striding and Springing), a potion, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Touch the Stars

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by The Role Initiative on March 22, 2020

A battle rages in the sky above the Monastery of the Yellow Rose between illithid and githyanki, as a novice of the Yellow Rose carrying crucial knowledge has disappeared. As the Monastery of the Yellow Rose braces itself for the onslaught, you must use your wits and resources to find the missing novice. Will you succeed in time to save the Order of the Yellow Rose? Part One of the Siege of the Yellow Rose.

Items

  • Shadowneedle (Unbreakable Arrow) Common
  • Shoes of the Glacier Walker (Boots of Striding and Springing) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Cause Fear Common

item.title: CCC-TRI-27 ROSE1-2 - In the Vault of Stars
item.description: Githyanki Greater Silver Sword (Silvered Greatsword, +2)
item.content:encoded:
In the Vault of Stars

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by The Role Initiative on March 22, 2020

A battle rages in the sky above the Monastery of the Yellow Rose between illithid and githyanki ships as shadowy shapes amass on the Glacier of the White Worm. As the Monastery of the Yellow Rose braces itself for the onslaught, you are sent onto the glacier in search of a secret githyanki base and to discover if the appearance of dragons brings ominous portents. Part Two of the Siege of the Yellow Rose.

Items

  • Githyanki Greater Silver Sword (Silvered Greatsword, +2) Rare

item.title: CCC-TRI-28 ROSE1-3 - Siege of the Yellow Rose
item.description: Cosmic Chasuble (Robe of Stars)
item.content:encoded:
Siege of the Yellow Rose

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by The Role Initiative on March 22, 2020

Beyond the Glacier of the White Worm lies the Monastery of the Yellow Rose. High in the skies above the monastery, a battle rages between illithid and githyanki. While others search the monastery and the glacier for clues, you are asked to defend the monastery from those in the skies and on the ground. Can you defend the monastery long enough for the clues to be uncovered? Part Three of the Siege of the Yellow Rose.

Items

  • Cosmic Chasuble (Robe of Stars) Very Rare

item.title: DDAL-EB-04 - The Third Protocol

The Third Protocol

The Oracle of War has been recovered from the Mournland. Its creators respond by activating the third protocol, an instruction to recover the device and eliminate all who know of its existence. As night falls, a posse of assassins step off the lightning rail with orders to raze Salvation to the ground and retrieve the Oracle.

The final adventure in the four-part Spoils of War storyline.

item.title: CCC-AETHER02-01 - The Heir of Orcus: Verse IV
item.description: Candle of the Deep, Hat of Disguise, 2 potions, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Heir of Orcus: Verse IV

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on February 17, 2020

Agents have uncovered several cells of the Cult of the Heir in the Moonsea region. Plan and lead an elite operation to eliminate the cells, but beware…one wrong choice might lead to certain death

Items

  • Candle of the Deep Common
  • Hat of Disguise Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Giant Strength (Hill) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Invulnerability Rare

Story Awards

Death to the Heir!

Your planning and mission were flawlessly executed! You dealt a significant blow to the Cult of the Heir this day . With the information you collected you can immediately begin seeking out hidden cells to destroy whatever remains of the Cult of the Heir.

Game Over Man, Game Over!

Your mission is a failure. The forces of good sustained high levels of casualties and the Cult of the Heir successfully thwarted your goals.

item.title: CCC-GSP01-03 - Tainted Love
item.description: Cloak of Many Fashions and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Tainted Love

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on February 3, 2020

Rizgrim, the Great Doomguide of Kelemvor has discovered that the land within the Quivering Forest near the burial site of her friend is slowly being consumed by dark magic. The adventurers have been asked to find the source and eliminate it as soon as possible. Failing on this task could turn her dead friend into a dracolich. Nobody wants that! Right?! Part 3 of the Clover Group Series.

Items

  • Cloak of Many Fashions Common

Story Awards

In Search of Her

You have found and read the journal of Tho’Guroh, containing information on how to find a hag’s dark lair. Whenever you succeed in finding a hag’s lair, a trail of thin mist appears, leading up to the location you are looking for. While the mist is present, you hear whispers of a very convincing old woman telling you to get "samples" from your party members, like a strand of hair, spit, dead skin, fingernails, etc. Remove this story award when you meet Jenny Greenteeth.

Clingy Jelly!

You spared the life of an oblex spawn. As a token of appreciation, it separates a part of itself and places a thin translucent layer of star-shaped green goo on your forehead. Whenever you are in combat, the goo stretches and changes shape, becoming a horn. Whenever you die, its shape changes into a small, flat skull. You can remove this story award by casting lesser restoration on yourself.

item.title: CCC-TRI-20 YUL1-5 - Breaking Yûlash
item.description: Wand of Polymorph, 2 potions, 2 scrolls, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Breaking Yûlash

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by The Role Initiative on January 15, 2020

The city of Yûlash is under siege. Can you and a small allied force break the siege, save your allies, and discover who or what is behind the assault? Part Five of the Yûlash series.

Items

  • Wand of Polymorph Very Rare
  • 2 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Blight Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Fabricate Rare

Story Awards

Shots Fired

You have committed an act of war against the Zhentarim by killing a spy while working for First Lord Yestral. This story reward may come into play in the future.

item.title: CCC-TRI-21 YUL1-6 - The Rifts of Madness
item.description: Kaorti Resin Armor (Scale Armor of Psychic Resistance), a potion, and 3 scrolls
item.content:encoded:
The Rifts of Madness

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by The Role Initiative on January 15, 2020

The vast power released by the destruction of a powerful gate connected to the Far Realm created rifts in the fabric of the planes. Even worse, a foul taint has begun permeating into the planes. Are you brave enough to face what is lurking beyond the Rifts of Madness? Part Six of the Yûlash series.

Items

  • Kaorti Resin Armor (Scale Armor of Psychic Resistance) Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Immolation Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Mass Healing Word Uncommon
