item.title: DDAL09-08 - In the Garden of Evil
item.description: Arrow-Catching Shield, a potion, 2 story awards, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
In the Garden of Evil

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on January 6, 2020

Long before it was a war-ravaged battlefield, Avernus was a den of temptation; a place to which ambitious, greedy, and covetous mortals were lured by the promise of power, wealth, and love. While the plane no longer serves this purpose, small pockets of terrible beauty remain. You have been sent in search of one such oasis to locate a fallen celestial. Will you be able to find it? More importantly, will the creature still be capable of service as an agent of good?

Items

  • Arrow-Catching Shield Rare
  • 1 x Golden Fruit (Potion of Healing) Common
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Holy Protector

Filled with the pride and glory she once felt in the vanguard of the Hellriders, you have guided Zhalruban to her redemption. She has found her purpose in Dara’s mission and taken to the chosen of Ilmater as steadfastly as she did for Shalrel, her previous master.

Zhalruban now serves as a guide, protector, and mount for Dara in all future adventures.

A Welcome Haven

You have helped to redeem Zhalruban who has joined your and Dara’s quest. You have instructed her to stay within Bloodroot Grove to tend the once divine forest, so that they both can return to their once sacred standing.

As you travel through the depths and dangers of Avernus you will always find a haven from devils and other adversaries amongst the trees of Bloodroot Grove.

item.title: DDAL09-09 - Ruined Prospects
item.description: Heward's Handy Haversack, a potion, and 5 other items
item.content:encoded:
Ruined Prospects

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on January 6, 2020

Elturel isn’t the only city to have been claimed by Avernus; scores of towns and villages, long forgotten, litter the eternal battlefields. In one such place, a fallen Hellrider remains in stasis, waiting for the right time to rise and battle evil once more. Has that time come at long last?

Items

  • Heward's Handy Haversack Rare
  • 4 x Bolts, +2 Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

item.title: DDAL09-10 - Tipping the Scales
item.description: Ring of Free Action, a potion, and 3 other items
item.content:encoded:
Tipping the Scales

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on January 6, 2020

Wisdom is knowing when a battle fought is a battle lost. A dragon has engaged in a pitched battle for the soul of his consort for nearly a millennium, and it’s time for him to throw in the towel. Dara has asked that you venture into the Diremire Pit and convince him of this, as there are greater wars to be won!

Items

  • Ring of Free Action Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare
  • 1 x Rotten Apple (Potion of Fire Breath) Uncommon
  • 1 x Rotten Apple (Potion of Resistance) Uncommon
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

item.title: DDAL09-05 - Faces of Fortune
item.description: Gem of Seeing, a potion, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Faces of Fortune

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on December 9, 2019

Deep in hostile territory with the innocent girl Dara to protect, you will have to trust to the weapons of the enemy if you are to survive. Even with deceit as your shield and sabotage as your sword, luck is required to complete Dara’s holy mission. Thankfully Fai Chen knows to start your quest with the help of an old acquaintance… Mahadi, master of Mahadi’s Traveling Emporium. Part One of the Behind Infernal Lines series of adventures.

Items

  • Gem of Seeing Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Invulnerability Rare
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

No Exceptions

You’ve broken Mahadi’s only rules: “No fighting! No spellcasting! No exceptions!” By choosing to break the rules, you’ve been kicked out of Mahadi’s emporium. Now you must survive in the wastes without its safe shelter. You start any tier 2 Avernus Rising adventure at half hit points and with a level of exhaustion that can’t be removed.

item.title: DDAL09-06 - Infernal Insurgency
item.description: Arrow of Slaying (Tiefling), Glamoured Studded Leather, a potion, 2 story awards, and 3 other items
item.content:encoded:
Infernal Insurgency

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on December 9, 2019

Fai Chen reveals that a draft of the Hellriders’ original attack plan might still exist, and it won’t be easy to get it. If you can recover these, it would be extremely helpful in your quest to locate their remains and free their spirits. It might very well be a suicide mission, though when you’re in Avernus, what isn’t? Fortunately, the wily merchant has just the plan for a group of heroes unconcerned with the odds. Part Two of the Behind Infernal Lines series of adventures.

Items

  • Arrow of Slaying (Tiefling) Very Rare
  • Glamoured Studded Leather Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Giant Strength (Fire) Rare
  • 3 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

No Exceptions!

You’ve broken Mahadi’s only rules: “No fighting! No spellcasting! No exceptions!” By choosing to break the rules, you’ve been kicked out of Mahadi’s emporium. Now you must survive in the wastes without its safe shelter. You start any tier 2 Avernus Rising adventure at half hit points and with a level of exhaustion that can’t be removed.

Plague of Plagueshield

You’ve delivered a great blow to the forces of Zariel. The idea that mere mortals could strike a blow at the fiendish forces has struck concern, fear, and spite into the minds of the fiends in the area. Your rumors precede you…are they true?

item.title: DDAL09-07 - The Diabolical Dive
item.description: Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals, a potion, 2 story awards, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
The Diabolical Dive

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on December 9, 2019

You have located the plans and drawn the infernal forces away from them. All that remains now is to dive below the river Styx and infiltrate Plagueshield Point without getting wet, setting off any alarms, or being followed. Piece of devil’s food cake. Part Three of the Behind Infernal Lines series of adventures.

Items

  • Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Invisibility Rare
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Thief of Infernal Knowledge

You recovered additional intelligence that could allow you to avoid the movements of devilish forces later in your adventures. This Story Award will affect the later Tier 4 adventures.

Savior of My Enemy’s Enemy

You saved a group of drow slaves. Even though these devotees of Lolth aren’t good people themselves, you know how the saying goes: the enemy of my enemy is my friend. This Story Award will affect the later Tier 4 adventures.

item.title: CCC-ODFC03-01 - A Momentary Lapse of Reason
item.description: Instrument of Illusions, Mithral Scale Mail Armor, 2 potions, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
A Momentary Lapse of Reason

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on December 1, 2019

With the fall of Mulmaster during the Red War, the Moonsea region has never been so depressed. The churches of Milil and Lliira think they have a solution–a festival of music culminating in an epic, Battle of the Bards. Can you help raise the spirits of the people? Do you have what it takes to rock the people of Mulmaster with music, not elemental devastation? Part One of the Return of Revelry series.

Items

  • Instrument of Illusions Common
  • Mithral Scale Mail Armor Uncommon
  • 2 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

Story Awards

Champion of the Displaced

You have become famous and a hero to refugees and displaced persons around the Moonsea. Unless you act in a destructive or hostile manner, refugees around the Moonsea will be friendly to you.

The Respect of Astarlax

Your knowledge of the obscure has impressed Astarlax the Berbalang. Whenever you cast Contact Other Plane, Commune, or Legend Lore, Astarlax will be the source of your information as either the mysterious entity from another plane, divine proxy, or simply a knowledgeable muse, respectively.

item.title: DDEP09-02 - Hellfire Requiem
item.description: Hellrider's Badge, 9 potions, 3 scrolls, a story award, and 11 other items
item.content:encoded:
Hellfire Requiem

Season 9 Epic for Tiers 1 and 2 Released on October 31, 2019

Visitors from far and wide gather at Torm’s Hand to honor a fallen hero. Yet, the somber day turns to chaos when a hell-spawned maw erupts over the area, bringing an army of devils with it. Only true courage and sharp minds can banish the dark forces that seek to claim the souls of all within the holy temple. Are you ready to lead the charge?

Items

  • Hellrider's Badge Rare
  • 2 x Burnt Othur Fumes (Inhaled) Common
  • 2 x Essence of Ether (Inhaled) Common
  • 2 x Healer's kit Common
  • 2 x Holy water (flask) Common
  • 1 x Oil of Slipperiness Uncommon
  • 3 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 4 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 2 x Potion of Heroism Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Blight Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Lesser Restoration Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Phantasmal Killer Rare
  • 2 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Marked by Bel

You agreed to make a deal with Bel or one of his minions. Your soul is now forfeit; if you die, you can only be restored to life via a wish or true resurrection spell, after which you can remove this award. Similarly, you regain hit dice at half the normal rate. However, Bel has granted you some special powers in exchange for this self-sacrifice:

Bel's Blessings

CostBenefit
1 Hit DieReroll a failed saving throw or an attack roll that missed its target.
2 Hit DiceYou grow leathery wings and a flight speed of 20 ft. for 1 minute.
3 Hit DiceYou may spend a bonus action to turn devils that are faithful to Zariel as if they were undead and you were using the Channel Divinity: Turn Undead cleric class feature. This has no effect on other creatures, or on devils that are devoted to an archdevil other than Zariel. You do not need to be a cleric to use this ability, nor do you need to wield a holy symbol—when you perform this profane rite, Bel’s sigil materializes above your head and glows with purple light.
5 Hit DiceBel delivers one common or uncommon permanent magic item to you. This item does not count against your magic item limit, and you may use this item for one hour at which time it crumbles to dust as it is reclaimed by the archdevil.
8 Hit DiceBel delivers one rare magic permanent magic item to you, or one uncommon consumable magic item. This item does not count against your magic item limit, and you may use this item for one hour at which time it crumbles to dust as it is reclaimed by the archdevil.

item.title: DDEP09-03 - Liar's Night
item.description: Cloak of the Bat and Hat of Disguise
item.content:encoded:
Liar's Night

Season 9 Epic for Tiers 1 and 2 Released on October 31, 2019

On this holy day (tribute to Leira and Mask), folk of all walks of life don masks and costumes to disguise themselves and play at being other than what they are. Festivities begin in the evening, when candles are placed in hollowed-out pumpkins carved with faces. Tricks and pranks of all kinds are common on this night, and pickpockets are rife on this day, so few carry much coin with them, having secreted it away somewhere the previous evening. Instead, people fill their pockets and belt pouches with candies. Come celebrate with us on the darkened streets of Baldur’s Gate.

Items

  • Cloak of the Bat Rare
  • Hat of Disguise Uncommon

item.title: DDAL09-01 - Escape from Elturgard
item.description: Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Escape from Elturgard

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on October 28, 2019

Damnation! The entire city of Elturel—along with its denizens—have been drawn into Avernus, the first layer of the Nine Hells! While those fortunate enough to have been outside of the city’s walls have been spared that fate, they’re not yet out of danger! The refugees formed a caravan bound for the nearby city of Baldur’s Gate. Can you keep them safe from devils, bandits, and one another until they reach safety?

Items

  • Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location Uncommon

Story Awards

Cooler Heads Prevail

You have spared the murderer, Vollis, in the hopes that she will be brought to justice upon arriving in Baldur’s Gate.

item.title: DDAL09-02 - Stopped at the Gate
item.description: Eyes of the Eagle and 2 potions
item.content:encoded:
Stopped at the Gate

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on October 28, 2019

It’s been a long, arduous trip, but you’re finally here—Baldur’s Gate. You’re not out of peril yet, however, even if you’re leaving the lawless wilds behind you, the streets of the Gate still run red with blood. But you quickly find that arriving at the city wasn’t the biggest challenge at all, now you must convince the city’s rulers to grant asylum to you and those in your charge. Part One of the Betrayal is in the Blood series of adventures.

Items

  • Eyes of the Eagle Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Potion of Poison Uncommon

item.title: DDAL09-03 - Hungry Shadows
item.description: Gloves of Thievery and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Hungry Shadows

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on October 28, 2019

Bodies continue pile up, and the Flaming Fist still has nothing but a name. Thankfully, the perpetrator of the murders has slipped up and the Flaming Fist has captured one of their underlings, in turn, has revealed the presence of a cult hideout in the sewers beneath the city. The Flaming Fist has asked that you investigate. Are you up for the task? Part Two of the Betrayal is in the Blood series of adventures.

Items

  • Gloves of Thievery Uncommon
  • 1 x Scroll of Protection (Fiends) Rare

item.title: DDAL09-04 - Day of the Devil
item.description: Periapt of Health, 2 potions, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Day of the Devil

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on October 28, 2019

The streets of Baldur’s Gate run red with blood. Old blood. The blood of Hellriders. Someone or something is punishing the children for the sins of the father and it’s time to put it to an end. Who and where is Gharizol? Part Three of the Betrayal is in the Blood series of adventures.

Items

  • Periapt of Health Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Potion of Growth Uncommon
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

item.title: DDAL00-11a - Reunited and It Feels So Good
item.description: a story award
item.content:encoded:
Reunited and It Feels So Good

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 1 Released on October 23, 2019

Story Awards

Private in Pipyap’s Legion

Pipyap prefers to enlist wayward devils into his crew, but a devil you know did him a solid, and he didn’t really have any other way of repaying them. As such, he’s infused you with a bit of his own Infernal nature. You gain proficiency in Infernal. In addition, if you’re hit by an attack, you can use your reaction to gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered until the end of your next turn. Once you use this ability, you can’t use it again until you’ve completed a long rest. This story award may only be applied to the character who gained the level awarded above.

This boon isn’t without cost, however. Pipyap may come calling and refusing his call may have dire consequences, indeed.

item.title: DDAL00-11b - When the Debt Comes Due
item.description: Stone of Good Luck (Luckstone), 2 potions, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
When the Debt Comes Due

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 1 Released on October 23, 2019

Items

  • Stone of Good Luck (Luckstone) Uncommon
  • 2 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Debt to Tal’kandelagrag

You have agreed to serve the night hag, Tal’kandelagrag. For every year of service that you agreed to, you owe her one soul coin. While in her service, she can compel you to undertake missions for her.

item.title: DDAL00-11c - I've Seen Fire and I've Seen Pain
item.description: Armor of Resistance (Fire), a scroll, a story award, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
I've Seen Fire and I've Seen Pain

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 2 Released on October 23, 2019

Items

  • Armor of Resistance (Fire) Rare
  • 1 x Fire Wine (Potion of Fire Breath) Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Sending Uncommon
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Ticket to Ride

You’ve successfully completed the task that Shirvasa the sommelier has set for you, and in exchange he provides you with a voucher for travel by gondola within the Abriymoch city limits. Present it to any gondolier and not only do you ride for free, but the devilish gondoliers treat you as one of Shirvasa’s associates—only with more respect.

item.title: DDAL00-11d - The Love Triangle Contract
item.description: Ioun Stone of Protection, Moon-Touched Longsword, a potion, a scroll, a spellbook, a story award, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
The Love Triangle Contract

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 2 Released on October 23, 2019

Items

  • Ioun Stone of Protection Rare
  • Moon-Touched Longsword Common
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Summon Lesser Demons Uncommon
  • 2 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Spellbooks

  • Infernal Spellbook: false life, ray of sickness, witch bolt, Aganazzar's scorcher, mind spike, shadow blade, bestow curse, life transference, and sickening radiance

Story Awards

Pipyap Owes You One

You have done a favor for the imp Pipyap and now he owes you one. You can cash in this favor in one of three ways:

  • Gain 150 gp.
  • Gain one consumable potion or scroll from Table A or B in the Dungeon Master’s Guide.
  • Pipyap arranges for your body to be recovered when otherwise thought lost. It’s best not to ask how he did it or where that strange smell came from.

This favor goes both ways. Now that you have accepted something from the devil, he might call on you in the future to further your alliance.

item.title: DDAL00-11e - A Fire Grows in Cania
item.description: Staff of Frost, 5 potions, a scroll, and 5 other items
item.content:encoded:
A Fire Grows in Cania

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 3 Released on October 23, 2019

Items

  • Staff of Frost Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Clairvoyance Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Poison Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Fire) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Supreme Healing Very Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Dominate Person Rare
  • 5 x Soul Coin Uncommon

item.title: DDAL00-11f - Twice as Nice for Half the Price
item.description: Ioun Stone of Mastery, a potion, a scroll, a story award, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
Twice as Nice for Half the Price

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 4 Released on October 23, 2019

Items

  • Ioun Stone of Mastery Legendary
  • 1 x Potion of Speed Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Maddening Darkness Very Rare
  • 2 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Lord of the Gorge

You defeated and killed Xak’thar the Twin, the ravenous conjoined twin pit fiends of the Gorge of Slaughter. You ascended to its place as lord of that pit, and for a year and a day your reign was bloody and brutal—until some meddling adventure defeated you! You are retired from D&D Adventurers League play for a year and a day from today’s date, and upon your return you are proficient in the Infernal tongue and have acquired a lemure follower; this creature is fanatical in its devotion but is entirely pitiful. Downtime days can’t be used to lessen this time spent in Nessus.

item.title: DDAL-DRW03 - Saving Silverbeard
item.description: Helm of Brilliance and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Saving Silverbeard

Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 3 Released on September 25, 2019

Powerful elements collide in the wake of the attack on Myth Nantar. The conclusion to the haunting sea-faring tale on the Sea of Fallen Stars.

Items

  • Helm of Brilliance Very Rare

Story Awards

Turmish Hospitality

As a thanks for their aid in uncovering the Thayan plot, Turmish become a safe harbor for the characters, and they are always offered a place to stay. Zehira remains a friend to the party.

item.title: DDAL00-10 - Trust and Understanding
item.description: Holy Symbol of Kyuss (Talisman of Ultimate Evil), Ioun Stone of Greater Absorption, 3 scrolls, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Trust and Understanding

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 4 Released on September 7, 2019

The shield dwarves of western Faerûn sometimes speak of a labyrinthine structure on the shores of a misty lake. Rumored to imprison an ancient creature that predates Faerûn’s beginnings, the place has long been sealed. But now coins are showing up in bazaars and trader’s booths that match the description of those minted by this citadel, and they are rightly concerned.

Items

  • Holy Symbol of Kyuss (Talisman of Ultimate Evil) Legendary
  • Ioun Stone of Greater Absorption Legendary
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Antilife Spell Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Geas Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Heal Very Rare

Story Awards

Favored of the Worm

Any character that became worm-infected during this adventure earns this story award. Their flesh is covered in small black pock marks; even illusion magic does not disguise their presence. These characters feel a bond with insects and bugs (worms specifically) and feels a kinship with undead creatures even though they may not be friendly.

item.title: CCC-ALMOG-25 SALT01-05 - How the Prison Was Fed
item.description: Ear Horn of Hearing, Helm of Comprehending Languages, a potion, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
How the Prison Was Fed

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on September 4, 2019

A book found in the warden’s office gives clues on how to traverse the prison and how those that lived there were able to survive. Are there still survivors hidden in the Prison?

Items

  • Ear Horn of Hearing Common
  • Helm of Comprehending Languages Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Fireball Uncommon

item.title: CCC-SLMH01-01 - Codex Venator
item.description: a story award
item.content:encoded:
Codex Venator

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on August 19, 2019

The last descendent of an ancient order would like to vanquish that evil before it spreads, but, betrayed by his age, he’ll need the help of noble adventurers to fulfill his ancient thirst for vengeance.

Story Awards

Newblood Hunters

The characters have chosen to join the ancient Order of the Noble Hunters signing a contract with their own blood.

They can now use the manor as a base of their operation and they will certainly become entangled with other mysterious assignments from the Order.

Naturally, this will draw the attention of old enemies of the order…

item.title: CCC-ALMOG-26 DAGON01-01 - Shadowed Bellview
item.description: Bag of Holding, Candle of the Deep, 2 potions, 2 scrolls, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Shadowed Bellview

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on August 13, 2019

Some things are best left to rot in their forgotten temples. Even in the isolated village of Bellview, common folk suffers the consequences of a treasure hunter’s greed. Part One of The Jade Curse.

Items

  • Bag of Holding Uncommon
  • Candle of the Deep Common
  • 2 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 2 x Spell Scroll of Comprehend Languages Common

Story Awards

Touched by Dagon

Keeps track of how many jade shards the character has collected. Circle the number of jade shards your character has collected.

item.title: CCC-GSP01-02 - Brotherhood
item.description: Pipe of Smoke Monsters and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Brotherhood

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on August 13, 2019

Ragvala, an ancient gold dragon and the founder of the Five-Leaf Clover is dead. A funeral ceremony will be held in 3 days before he becomes one with the earth. Rokstasha, his friend and a djinni has asked the help of the adventurers to find the other members of the Five-Leaf Clover if they are still alive and have them attend the ceremony. Don’t be late! Part 2 of the Clover Group Series.

Items

  • Pipe of Smoke Monsters Common

Story Awards

Five-Leaf Clover Initiate

A senior member of the Five Leaf Clover has taken a liking of you and made you a junior member of their adventuring group. A magical tattoo of a five-leaf clover has been permanently placed at the back of your right hand. When you put your will to it, harmless green flame erupts from the tattoo and engulfs your hand.

Doomguide of Kelemvor

You are now an official priest of Kelemvor, also known as a Doomguide. You have received a set of smoky grey priestly vestments with the symbol of Kelemvor and a cowled cloak with a white domino mask that emanates harmless blue flame whenever you wear it. You also gain the following ideal, "Death is but part of life: fear it not, evade it not, and view it not as evil."

item.title: CCC-GAD01-03 - Caught in Time
item.description: Chronostat of Precision (Clockwork Amulet), Prospector’s Chronoglass (Periapt of Proof Against Poison), and 3 potions
item.content:encoded:
Caught in Time

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released on August 11, 2019

The island-penal colony of Kulaica houses some of the most dangerous creatures in all the Moonsea. You must infiltrate this penal colony and investigate the bizarre murders of wardens before the entire colony erupts in chaos.

Items

  • Chronostat of Precision (Clockwork Amulet) Common
  • Prospector’s Chronoglass (Periapt of Proof Against Poison) Rare
  • 2 x Potion of Invulnerability Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Supreme Healing Very Rare

item.title: CCC-ALMOG-27 DAGON01-02 - Cove of Fallen Souls
item.description: Dark Shard Amulet and Ring of Swimming
item.content:encoded:
Cove of Fallen Souls

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on August 3, 2019

When a demon lord rises beneath the town of Bellview, adventurers must delve through lost sea caves and depths unknown to track this monster’s descent. Will they arrive in time to save its latest victims or be consumed by the Lord of the Deep himself? Part Two of The Jade Curse.

Items

  • Dark Shard Amulet Common
  • Ring of Swimming Uncommon

item.title: DDEP-DRW01 - Assault on Myth Nantar
item.description: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing, Staff of Thunder and Lightning, Tentacle Rod, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Assault on Myth Nantar

Dreams of Red Wizards Epic for Tiers 2 and 3 Released on July 31, 2019

Thay has set it sights on taking the underwater city of Myth Nantar. Can you stop a full-on invasion by its undead armada, or will the elves be looking for a new home?

Items

  • Gloves of Swimming and Climbing Uncommon
  • Staff of Thunder and Lightning Very Rare
  • Tentacle Rod Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

item.title: CCC-TRI-34 DEAD1-3 - Rise of the Sea Dragon
item.description: Candle of the Deep, Trident of Warning, a potion, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Rise of the Sea Dragon

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by The Role Initiative on July 28, 2019

Old pirates tell an aged tale of a black dragon attacking merchant ships sailing the Moonsea. The beast was slain, or so they thought. Recently, merchant ships have been attacked, and they say the culprit was a black dragon. The beast may fly away with a few victims, but it leaves the rest to fend for themselves in the Moonsea.

Could this be the same creature from before? Can the adventurers slay the dragon and bring peace to the waters of the Moonsea? Part Three of the Dead Men series.

Items

  • Candle of the Deep Common
  • Trident of Warning Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare

Story Awards

Mark of the Dead

Either Abigail or Peaches explains that Captain Dread Red offers to tattoo each party member with the mark of his crew (the symbol for this adventure saga). If they agree, a jittering zombie with long, white hair, a bulging and blind right eye, and a wooden peg leg staggers up to them carrying a tattoo kit: a small hammer, a needle that resembles an icepick, and a bottle of black ink.

The tattoo process isn’t painful, the design is clean, and it can be placed anywhere on the body.

The Mark of the Dead may grant a character special conditions in future Dead Men’s Tales adventures.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON3-3 - Beneath the Cairnwell
item.description: Ever Vigilant (Silvered Greatsword of Warning), 3 potions, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Beneath the Cairnwell

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on July 25, 2019

The lost moonwell, known as the Cairnwell, plays a significant role in the battle for the Fairheight Range. Can it be saved and turned into a source of weal for the dwarves, or will the enemy take its power and turn it into a fountain of woe? Part 3 of the Fairheight trilogy.

Items

  • Ever Vigilant (Silvered Greatsword of Warning) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Gaseous Form Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Poison) Uncommon

Story Awards

Celebrated by the Wardens

For your bravery in eliminating the threat of the shadow dragon Pryumbranth and ensuring to portal is established between Alaron and Oman, your exploits are lauded by Wardens of the Deepshaes. If you are a member of that organization and completed MOON3 trilogy, you are considered to have completed a Major Objective for advancement in that group.

item.title: CCC-BWM-04-01 - Thralls of Zuggtmoy: The Myconic Nidus
item.description: Miir (Scimitar of Warning), a potion, and 4 other items
item.content:encoded:
Thralls of Zuggtmoy: The Myconic Nidus

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on July 10, 2019

Under the Flooded Forest grows a toxic maze of magical fungi called the Nidus. From this horrid realm a cult has struck a terrible blow against the wood elves struggling to regrow the trees in the forsaken swamp of the Flooded Forest. The elves, on the brink of extinction, need the adventurers to navigate this deadly labyrinth and recover a precious object. But the tunnels here crawl with spore-laden beasts and demons, and the very air itself is poisonous.

Items

  • Miir (Scimitar of Warning) Uncommon
  • 4 x Arrow, +1 Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Fire Breath Uncommon

item.title: CCC-BWM-04-02 - Thralls of Zuggtmoy: Sanctum of Rot
item.description: Cloak of Protection, a potion, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Thralls of Zuggtmoy: Sanctum of Rot

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on July 10, 2019

Beyond the Nidus waits the inner sanctum where the heroes must confront Zuggtmoy’s zealot priest and his dark followers. The cult is preparing to use the Noctic Urn to lure a horrific entity to the Material Plane. The adventurers must stop them, or woe to all should they fail.

Items

  • Cloak of Protection Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Giant Strength (Hill) Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Vampiric Touch Uncommon

item.title: CCC-TAROT-02-04 - Moonlit Waves, Part 1
item.description: Folding Boat, a potion, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Moonlit Waves, Part 1

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on July 10, 2019

The havoc caused by the emergence of the Tarot Cards is not limited just to the lands of Thentia. Many trading vessels lie at the bottom of the harbor, sunk by unknown causes. Today, another attempt is made to raise one of those sunken ships. Part Eleven of Song of Fates.

Items

  • Folding Boat Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Water Breathing Uncommon

Story Awards

Saved by Muma

You contested with the Ghost of Seireri Moongleam in an attempt to free her soul but were found wanting. If it were not for Muma’s freshly baked cookies you may still be locked in that Lantern.

Tarot of Fate (The Star): Inverted

You’ve retrieved the ghost of Seireri Moongleam from its banishment. Muma is working to release her soul so Seireri can once again protect her city.

Tarot of Fate (The Star): Upright

The ghost of Seireri Moongleam has been lost once again and the Fate of Thentia has become a bit more clouded.

item.title: DDAL-DRW01 - Breaking Umberlee's Resolve
item.description: Iron Bands of Bilarro and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Breaking Umberlee's Resolve

Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 2 Released on July 5, 2019

The search for a missing young woman kicks off a treacherous journey on the Sea of Fallen Stars.

Items

  • Iron Bands of Bilarro Rare

Story Awards

Zehira’s Allyship

As a thanks for freeing her from the morkoth lair, Zehira becomes a staunch ally of the characters. She boldly assumes command of Umberlee’s Resolve. Upon return to Turmish, she makes amends with her parents and takes on the role of a privateer captain sailing under the flag of Turmish. She accompanies the characters on the next adventure.

item.title: DDAL-DRW02 - Blood in the Water
item.description: Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Blood in the Water

Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 2 Released on July 5, 2019

An exploration to the underwater city of Myth Nantar leads to a conspiracy, a mystery, and a heist.

Items

  • Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals Rare

Story Awards

Thessalia’s Allyship

Helping Thessalia retrieve the bowl of commanding water elementals earns them her allyship. Thessalia is less of a fighter and more of a scholar, but she gladly helps research topics that aid in their quest. Like Zehira, Thessalia is proudly Turmish and wants to keep her homeland free from Thay.

item.title: CCC-TAROT-02-05 - Hollow Hopes
item.description: The Auftrag’s Buskins (Winged Boots) and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Hollow Hopes

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on July 4, 2019

The number of infected have grown. The quarantine is filling with people. One of the former Watchlord candidates, Edea Valkrana, has contacted you asking for help. Discreetly. Rumors of a cure are rampant—saying there is a mysterious figure hiding somewhere in Thentia near the wall. Is it real? Only one way to find out… Part Twelve of Song of Fates.

Items

  • The Auftrag’s Buskins (Winged Boots) Uncommon

Story Awards

Tarot of Fate (Justice): Inverted

By letting Amy stay in the city while infected, whether you protected her or let her escape, it ended up leading to multiple others being infected as well by the Wood Woad Plague, thus furthering the plots of the Cult of Ordinances. Because of this, you may gain their blessing in a future adventure.

Tarot of Fate (Justice): Upright

By helping the quarantine officers move the infected into the quarantine zone, you have foiled the plot of the Cult of the Ordinances. Because of this, you may suffer their ire in a future adventure.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON3-1 - Atop the Fairheights
item.description: Belt of Dwarvenkind, Periapt of Wound Closure, 4 potions, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Atop the Fairheights

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on June 23, 2019

Just as it looked like the combined forces of Clan Rookoath and Clan Rustfire might drive a long-time threat from their ancestral homes, the dwarven forces suffer a terrible defeat. The proud and slightly xenophobic dwarves reach out for assistance. But is it too late, or can a group of heroes turn the tide? The first adventure in the Fairheight trilogy.

Items

  • Belt of Dwarvenkind Rare
  • Periapt of Wound Closure Uncommon
  • 4 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

Story Awards

Death of Shale Rustfire

Despite your efforts, Shale Rustfire perished. How his death will affect the war effort remains to be seen.

Savior of Shale Rustfire

You were able to save Shale Rustfire before he perished. He’s now able to play a role in the coming war against the orcs and their allies.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON3-2 - Within the Tunnels of Dwarvenholm
item.description: Adamantine Chain Shirt, 2 potions, and 2 scrolls
item.content:encoded:
Within the Tunnels of Dwarvenholm

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on June 23, 2019

With the immediate threat to Clans Rookoath and Rustfire quelled, the next step is to clear the tunnels of Dwarvenholm, allowing the clans to again move freely between their homes. However, the enemy will not give up their gains so easily, as a new player enters the battlefield. Part 2 of the Fairheight trilogy.

Items

  • Adamantine Chain Shirt Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Ceremony Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Mind Spike Uncommon

item.title: CCC-BWM-05 - Chasing Madness
item.description: Dark Shard Amulet, Portable Hole, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Chasing Madness

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on June 23, 2019

Four demon lord cults are competing for the possession and control of a crate full of mined minerals that radiate an intense amount of faerzress power. Local Emerald Enclave leader, Captain Rairdon Tanheel, hires a group of adventurers to retake the crate and get it back into safe hands and investigate why the crate has been stolen.

Items

  • Dark Shard Amulet Common
  • Portable Hole Rare

Story Awards

Captain Tanheel’s Manifest

Players who manage to find the crate of minerals without it being destroyed, and return it to Captain Tanheel, are awarded a spot on his manifest. Being on the list means that the adventurers are allowed one free ride on Captain Tanheel’s ship, Tymora’s Luck, anywhere along the Moonsea that sets out from the harbor of Hillsfar (during related CCC modules).

This story award only applies to the CCC modules set in Hillsfar at the BWM, SQC and ELF conventions.

item.title: CCC-BWM-06 - Introduction to Adventuring
item.description: a potion
item.content:encoded:
Introduction to Adventuring

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on June 10, 2019

Recent events in the Moonsea have caused Hillsfar to become a booming economy. This has attracted many new adventurers to the area and unfortunately brought an increase in deaths of overconfident adventurers too. Bert the Goblin has decided to sponsor an “Introduction to Adventuring” workshop! Explore Hillsfar and the five factions by participating in any one of five different missions and pick up basic skills while learning about the factions!

Items

  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DDAL00-07 - The Embers of Hate
item.description: Wand of Pyrotechnics, Weapon of Warning, 3 potions, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
The Embers of Hate

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tiers 1 and 2 Released on June 5, 2019

Hatred burns with a fire unlikely any other; and the hotter the flame, the more difficult it is to stamp it out. Beneath the rubble of Mulmaster, and a group of angry men and women seek to stoke smoldering embers of hate anew into a raging conflagration. Can you stop them before it is too late, or will evil rise once more from the ashes—free to burn all it touches?

Items

  • Wand of Pyrotechnics Common
  • Weapon of Warning Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Fire) Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Burning Hands Common

item.title: DDAL-OPEN-2019 - Forged in Fire
item.description: 7 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Forged in Fire

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 2 Released on May 31, 2019

Story Awards

2019 D&D Open DM Award

You can create a new 7th-level D&D Adventurers League character using this award. That character can start with one of the following magic items:

  • Amulet of health
  • Boots of levitation
  • Cloak of the bat
  • Flame tongue longsword
  • Helm of teleportation
2019 D&D Open Participant Award

Thank you for participating in the 2019 D&D Open! For simply having a grand time, you can create a new 5th-level D&D Adventurers League character using this award. You get to skip those pesky first four levels! Congratulations.

2019 D&D Open Winner Award

You can create a new 11th-level D&D Adventurers League character using this award. That character can start with one of the following magic items:

  • +2 armor
  • +3 wand of the war mage
  • +3 weapon
  • Ring of regeneration
  • Staff of lightning and thunder
Bessed Dressed DM Award

You can create a new 11th-level D&D Adventurers League character using this award. That character can start with one of the following magic items:

  • +2 armor
  • Belt of stone giant strength
  • Cloak of arachnida
  • Robe of scintillating colors
  • Robe of stars
Friends Over Fights Award

The character you create with your 2019 D&D Open Participant Story Award gains one of the following magic items:

  • Boots of speed
  • Cape of the mountebank
  • Horn of Valhalla
  • Portable hole
  • Staff of healing
Ready for Combat Award

The character you create with your 2019 D&D Open Participant Story Award gains one of the following magic items:

  • +1 armor
  • +2 wand of the war mage
  • +2 weapon
  • Ring of the ram
  • Staff of withering
Soulless Award

You gain advantage on a Charisma (Deception or Intimidation) check. After you use this feature, all Charisma ability checks you make for the next 24 hours are made with disadvantage, and you cannot use this feature again until the end of that time.

item.title: CCC-TRI-22 STORM1-1 - On the Baron's Trail
item.description: Bag of Devouring, a potion, a scroll, and a spellbook
item.content:encoded:
On the Baron's Trail

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by The Role Initiative on May 30, 2019

Following the destruction of the Thunderbound and the Ark of the Mountains, the cloud giant known as Baron Rajiram, remains at-large. A lead from the Harpers has brought the party to the city of Hulburg in pursuit of one of the Baron’s known accomplices. If they can locate his partner-in-crime, the party will be a step closer to finally apprehending the Baron and bringing him to justice. Part One of the Storm Herald trilogy.

Items

  • Bag of Devouring Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Longevity Very Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Sickening Radiance Rare

Spellbooks

  • Ozlo’s Spellbook: dancing lights, mage hand, minor illusion, poison spray, alarm, color spray, disguise self, mage armor, magic missile, unseen servant, invisibility, mirror image, phantasmal force, glyph of warding, major image, phantom steed, and phantasmal killer

item.title: CCC-TRI-24 STORM1-3 - Knight Errand
item.description: Manual of Gainful Exercise, a potion, a spellbook, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Knight Errand

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by The Role Initiative on May 30, 2019

The fortress moves, slow yet inevitable in its trek across the land of Thar towards the Sword Coast. On board are Baron Rajiram and his servant, Selise of Teshwave, and the awoken defenses ready to keep the fortress afloat. Prepare for the assault. Part Three of the Storm Herald trilogy.

Items

  • Manual of Gainful Exercise Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare
  • 1 x Spell scroll of Geas Rare

Spellbooks

  • Giant Spellbook: thunder step, investiture of stone, and whirlwind

item.title: CCC-TRI-29 TIDE1-1 - Tidefall
item.description: Dagger, +3 and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Tidefall

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by The Role Initiative on May 27, 2019

Though the Elemental Cults failed in the Dessarin Valley and in Mulmaster, fragments of their primordial cults still seek to destroy civilization. An unlikely contact alerts the heroes to impending ruin in the city of Phlan. Will the heroes be able to follow the ravings of a mad man to stop this scheme, or will even more catastrophe be visited upon the City of Phlan?

Items

  • Dagger, +3 Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare

item.title: CCC-TRI-30 STEEL1-1 - Remnants of a Dream
item.description: Cloak of Many Fashions, a spellbook, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Remnants of a Dream

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by The Role Initiative on May 27, 2019

Heroes of the Realms have risen to stand against several recent events. The schemes of foul villains would have caused catastrophe across the lands of Faerûn, had they not been thwarted. And although they were indeed thwarted…there were those who escaped justice. Some of these remnants still scheme, still desire to make their dreams of destruction reality. It is time for new heroes to rise… Part One of the Fire and Steel Resurgent series.

Items

  • Cloak of Many Fashions Common

Spellbooks

  • Traveling Spellbook: absorb elements, burning hands, ice knife, and continual flame

Story Awards

Busted!

A member of your party swiped something from the warehouse you were supposed to guard. The magistrate found that you were all culpable for the theft. Any payment for services rendered were reclaimed and the group of you were thrown in jail.

Additionally, you now have a criminal record in Hillsfar. This may work to your disadvantage in the future.

“My Hewo! Have a cookie!”

Katia, the young girl you rescued from the cultists now considers you her hero and her “bestest friend.” Whenever you enter the docks of Hillsfar, there is a 50% chance that the 5-year old will bound up to you, and exclaim that “You! You my hewo! Have cookie?” and offer you one of her gingerbread cookies.

item.title: CCC-TRI-31 TIME1-1 - Out of Time
item.description: Dimensional Shackles, a scroll, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Out of Time

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by The Role Initiative on May 27, 2019

Years ago, a young wizard looked out over the walls of his city and saw a vision in the winds—a vision of fire, conquest and glory. Now, his hour of destiny is at hand, and it may well spell disaster for the world. Can he be stopped before it’s too late?

Items

  • Dimensional Shackles Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Stone Shape Rare

Story Awards

Emnity of the Stouthammers

There may have been extenuating circumstances, but your part in the death of the Stouthammer garrison has earned you the enmity of their clan. You are not welcome at the Everforge, and any Stouthammer dwarf you meet will consider you a foe.

Friends in Hot Places

Your actions today have earned you the gratitude of a very powerful creature. Should you ever find yourself back on the Elemental Plane of Fire and visiting the City of Brass, you will be welcomed as a friend.

item.title: CCC-TRI-32 DAGGR1-1 - Casks and Caskets
item.description: Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location, 3 potions, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Casks and Caskets

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by The Role Initiative on May 27, 2019

The refugees of the Zhentarim Ghetto of Mulmaster have been abandoned by the city and its Thayan supporters. Work is hard to find, and even harder to accomplish as the everburning fires in the Ghetto continue unabated. It was inevitable that unrest in the Ghetto would grow, finally drawing the attention of the powers that be. Part One of the Daggers of Lathander series.

Items

  • Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location Uncommon
  • 3 x Potion of Healing Common

Story Awards

Known to the Daggers

A member of the Daggers has seen your face and lived to report it to the rest of his band. They will be on the lookout for you in the future.

item.title: CCC-TRI-33 DAGGR1-2 - Matters of Life and Death
item.description: Ring of Mind Shielding
item.content:encoded:
Matters of Life and Death

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by The Role Initiative on May 27, 2019

A known gang from the refugee ghetto of Mulmaster wishes to make a statement at an important function at the Thayan Embassy. A murder mystery investigation is needed to catch this culprit, or the delicate peace between the city and its Thayan supporters could be shattered! Part Two of the Daggers of Lathander series.

Items

  • Ring of Mind Shielding Uncommon

item.title: CCC-TRI-23 STORM1-2 - Sub Rosa
item.description: Studded Leather Armor, +2, a potion, a scroll, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Sub Rosa

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by The Role Initiative on May 26, 2019

Hot on the trail of Selise Teshwave and Baron Rajiram, the adventurers must enter newly exposed mountain excavations in the Galena mountains. Swift action must be taken to prevent the Baron from obtaining a powerful weapon from this ruin. Meanwhile, the mysterious Teshwave siblings, Abigail and Char, are hot on the trail of their older sister. Part Two of the Storm Herald trilogy.

Items

  • Studded Leather Armor, +2 Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Invisibility Very Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Skill Empowerment Rare

Story Awards

Just Rewards

You have handled the exploration of the ruins and the pursuit of the baron and Selise with delicacy, ingenuity, and care. This may have a benefit in a future adventure.

Relentless

Nothing could stand in your way from staying on the trail of The Baron and Selise, and everything that tried to surely regrets it. This may have a benefit in a future adventure.

item.title: DDALCA-01 - Return to the Ghost Tower of Inverness
item.description: Black Tooth (Dagger of Venom) and Frostbite (Frost Brand Longsword)
item.content:encoded:
Return to the Ghost Tower of Inverness

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 2 Released on May 22, 2019

This is a familiar scene. Shackled. Bound. The same faces surround you as the last time you were in this dark, dank cell. Your friends, your party members. You’ve been told that your actions have led to death and destruction near and far, but you were only doing what was demanded of you from those who hold you captive again now. A looming figure goes over your crimes and holds out a glowing gemstone, offering a trade for your lives. “You must undo what you have done and put this back,” he whispers. “You must return to the Ghost Tower.”

Items

  • Black Tooth (Dagger of Venom) Rare
  • Frostbite (Frost Brand Longsword) Very Rare

item.title: DDEP09-01 - Infernal Pursuits
item.description: Helm of Telepathy, Mantle of Spell Resistance, Necklace of Adaptation, 2 story awards, and 16 other items
item.content:encoded:
Infernal Pursuits

Season 9 Epic for Tier 1 Released on May 17, 2019

A horse race in Baldur’s Gate becomes a hellish battle on infernal war machines in Avernus when the characters get caught between two evil merchants…and must hang on for dear life.

Items

  • Helm of Telepathy Uncommon
  • Mantle of Spell Resistance Rare
  • Necklace of Adaptation Uncommon
  • 16 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Minted Soul

A portion of your soul has been minted into a soul coin: part of the damnable currency of the Nine Hells. As the coin moves through the markets of the inferno, you feel an echo that affects your mind. At the start of every gaming session you participate in, roll a d6 to determine an effect for that game.

Rolled d6Effect
1–3No effect
4Your soul coin is spent wisely by its owner. You gain inspiration at the start of this session.
5Your soul coin is spent foolishly by its owner. You can’t earn inspiration during this session.
6Your soul coin is stolen from its owner. You can only spend inspiration to benefit other players during this session.
Promised Soul

Your soul has been promised to a devil of the Nine Hells. If you die, it claims your soul and subjects it to an eternity of torment. The only way you can be restored to life is via a wish or true resurrection spell, after which you can remove this award.

item.title: CCC-NBDD01-01 - Clever
item.description: Portable Hole, 2 potions, and a spellbook
item.content:encoded:
Clever

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on May 15, 2019

A strange new crime family has been growing and tightening its grips on local businesses. Any who refuse their offers are found dead shortly after, torn apart by claws and teeth. Who is behind this wave of organized crime?

Items

  • Portable Hole Rare
  • 2 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

Spellbooks

  • Tyrant Lizard Transporter’s Spellbook: alarm, disguise self, illusory script, Tenser's floating disk, unseen servant, arcane lock, enlarge/reduce, levitate, rope trick, fly, gaseous form, nondetection, sending, fabricate, Leomund's secret chest, and telekinesis

item.title: DDAL08-16 - Change of Address
item.description: Plate Armor of Etherealness, 2 potions, and 3 scrolls
item.content:encoded:
Change of Address

Season 8 Adventure for Tier 4 Released on April 22, 2019

The hand behind the Baron of Blood’s troubles is revealed, and he vows to make himself the worst kind of neighbor. Part One of the Home Sweet Home trilogy.

Items

  • Plate Armor of Etherealness Legendary
  • 1 x Potion of Giant Strength (Fire) Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 3 x Spell Scroll of Lesser Restoration Uncommon

item.title: DDAL08-17 - The Tower of Ahghairon
item.description: Cubic Gate, a spellbook, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
The Tower of Ahghairon

Season 8 Adventure for Tier 4 Released on April 22, 2019

The Tower of Ahghairon has been sealed for years, but when the door opens at last, it’s an invitation to even more mystery within. Part Two of the Home Sweet Home trilogy.

Items

  • Cubic Gate Legendary
  • 2 x Water from the Fountain (Potion of Healing) Common

Spellbooks

  • Planer Spellbook: contact other planes and demiplane

item.title: DDAL08-18 - Moving Day
item.description: Rod of Resurrection and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Moving Day

Season 8 Adventure for Tier 4 Released on April 22, 2019

You must transport the Baron of Blood (sealed within his coffin) to his new home. Unfortunately, his new neighbors are not happy to see him move in, and the Mad Mage himself wants to throw him a housewarming party. Part Three of the Home Sweet Home trilogy.

Items

  • Rod of Resurrection Legendary
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: CCC-GAD01-02 - Red War: Black Phoenix
item.description: Dragonhide Saddle (Saddle of the Cavalier), Dread Helm, 2 potions, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Red War: Black Phoenix

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on April 17, 2019

The Cult of Reborn Flame initiates its most devastating plot against Mulmaster even as Thayans are invading the city. You must navigate the planar tunnels beneath Mulmaster and stop the Black Phoenix before a sea of fire engulfs the entire city, killing Thayans and Mulmasterites alike. Part Three of the Reborn Flame trilogy.

Items

  • Dragonhide Saddle (Saddle of the Cavalier) Uncommon
  • Dread Helm Common
  • 1 x Potion of Growth Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Mind Reading Rare

Story Awards

High Blade in Your Debt

You prevented an alliance between an efreeti pasha and the Cult of Reborn Flame, you rescued Selfaril Uoumdolphin from a mental prison woven by a hag coven, and you prevented the people and city of Mulmaster from being engulfed in lava by the Black Phoenix. For these deeds and more, the High Blade of Mulmaster is in your debt. With his city overrun by Thayans, Selfaril cannot repay that debt now, but perhaps that may change one day.

This story award doesn’t take effect until you successfully complete the Reborn Flame Trilogy:

  • CCC-ODFC02-02 Palace of the Efreeti
  • CCC-GAD01-01 Broken Blade
  • CCC-GAD01-02 Red War: Black Phoenix

If you have not yet completed the entire trilogy, you gain the full use of this story award after you successfully complete the missing adventures.

item.title: CCC-TAROT-02-01 - A Sunk Cost
item.description: The Plague Fly (Figurine of Wondrous Power (Ebony Fly)) and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
A Sunk Cost

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on April 17, 2019

With the election of a new Watchlord, Thentia’s will has been made clear: the infected must be kept from the healthy. Great walls now cut off the Harbor District from the rest of Thentia where the Watchlord promises the ill are being taken care of, but how do they really live? Part Eight of Song of Fates.

Items

  • The Plague Fly (Figurine of Wondrous Power (Ebony Fly)) Rare

Story Awards

Sweet and Stupid

This foxhound has taken a liking to you and follows you around. She has a few obvious signs of her time on the streets, but otherwise looks to be of good breeding.

Tarot of Fate (The Tower): Inverted

You either failed to deliver the wagon of coin to Widar Patja or took shortcuts along the way. Widar’s dreams will not be fulfilled, for good or ill.

Tarot of Fate (The Tower): Upright

You delivered the wagon of coin to Widar Patja in the proscribed manner. In the coming months the city will see significant changes at his hand.

item.title: DDAL00-09 - Minsc & Boo's Guide to Stuff and Things
item.description: Wind Fan, 4 potions, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Minsc & Boo's Guide to Stuff and Things

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 31, 2019

Undermountain: The Musical! is a light-hearted, satirical adventure optimized for five 8th-level characters that takes place in Waterdeep and later a lost level of that famed dungeon: Undermountain.

Items

  • Wind Fan Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 3 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Gust of Wind Uncommon

item.title: CCC-GAD01-01 - Broken Blade
item.description: Sea Hag's Cloak (Cloak of the Manta Ray), Selfaril's Soul Gem (Ruby of the War Mage), a scroll, a spellbook, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Broken Blade

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on March 27, 2019

On the eve of the Red War, the High Blade of Mulmaster has become incapacitated by a mental assault. To give the city a fighting chance, you must help Selfaril Uoumdolphin confront the shadows of his past and free him from a century-long hatred. Part Two of the Reborn Flame trilogy.

Items

  • Sea Hag's Cloak (Cloak of the Manta Ray) Uncommon
  • Selfaril's Soul Gem (Ruby of the War Mage) Common
  • 1 x Oil of Etherealness Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Revivify Uncommon

Spellbooks

  • Brotherhood Spellbook: absorb elements, silent image, unseen servant, mirror image, shadow blade, catnap, major image, sickening radiance, summon greater demon, dream, steel wind strike, mental prison, and crown of stars

Story Awards

A Lich’s Secret

When going through Selfaril’s memories of the past, you discovered Rastol Shan’s secret. He is a lich who was formerly Thurndan Tallwand, the Senior Cloak who betrayed Selfaril Uoumdolphin on behalf of his brother Rassendyll. What you do with this secret is up to you.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON2-3 - The Eye in the Mist
item.description: Llyneth’s Cloak of Mists (Cloak of Elvenkind), 2 potions, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Eye in the Mist

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Baldman Games on March 10, 2019

The events at Dynnegall revealed evidence that a new threat to fey and Ffolk may have emerged on Moray. The ties to prophecy are too strong to ignore. If true, every moment is critical. The Earthmother herself shudders as attention turns to the Eye in the Mist, a moonwell in the forest of Moray’s eastern coast.

Items

  • Llyneth’s Cloak of Mists (Cloak of Elvenkind) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Fire Breath Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Cold) Uncommon

Story Awards

Eye in the Stone

This small flat round stone is carved with a symbol of an eye with wave lines representing mist around it. It was given to you as a token of gratitude by Llyneth Kincaid, the great druid of the Eye in the Mist moonwell on Moray. The stone signifies her regard and may be useful in encounters with other druids of the Earthmother or with devout followers of the Earthmother among the Ffolk.

I Have My Eye on You

You’ve served Hyll the Ugliest Hag well, and she may have more tasks for you in the future. In the meantime, you occasionally get a glimpse of an eyeball sitting in a discrete location observing you. When you turn to get a better look, it’s gone.

item.title: DDEP08-03 - Last Orders at the Yawning Portal
item.description: Animated Shield, Ring of Invisibility, Rope of Climbing, Winged Boots, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Last Orders at the Yawning Portal

Season 8 Epic for All Tiers Released on March 7, 2019

Durnan has closed the Yawning Portal and mysteriously disappeared back down the well into Undermountain. His old adventuring companion Mirt has hung up his tankard and set off to find him, but he can’t do it alone. Champions gather from afar to answer his call and rescue one of the city’s most iconic heroes. Will YOU join them?

Items

  • Animated Shield Very Rare
  • Ring of Invisibility Legendary
  • Rope of Climbing Uncommon
  • Winged Boots Uncommon

Story Awards

Deep Delver

Your successes in the dungeons of Undermountain have brought you glory in the city above. You earn any additional point of renown. Whenever you return to Waterdeep following a successful expedition into the dungeons of Undermountain, you gain a free healing potion.

Tavern Hero

Your actions were noteworthy in rescuing Durnan the Innkeeper from the dungeons of Undermountain. The proprietor of the Yawning Portal has granted you free accommodation and drinks in his inn for the rest of your life and commissioned a portrait of your group to hang in the taproom until the end of time.

Sold Soul

Your soul has been promised to Breccia of the Growling Groghouse. If you later die, she claims your soul and uses it for own mysterious purposes. The only way you can be restored to life is via a true resurrection spell, after which this award is removed.

Rescue from Vanrakdoom

Season 8 Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 4, 2019

Vampires in service to Shar, the Mistress of Night, are somewhere in Vanrakdoom. You must locate them without drawing the attention of the other residents of this dangerous place. Part Two of the Undying Threat trilogy.

item.title: DDAL08-15 - Forge of Fangs
item.description: Ring of Shooting Stars and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Forge of Fangs

Season 8 Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 4, 2019

The Forge of Fangs has been located in Vanrakdoom. While many innocents have been saved from an undying fate, the forge remains. Artor Morlin would like to see it torn to the ground and the threat ended forever. Part Three of the Undying Threat trilogy.

Items

  • Ring of Shooting Stars Very Rare

Story Awards

Marked by Shar

Followers of Shar are always initially hostile to the characters.

Scholar of Vanrakdoom

This adventure has awakened in an interest in Vanrakdoom and Vanrak Moonstar. Characters can spend their time studying the histories of Vanrak and his cult of Shar.

item.title: CCC-TAROT-02-03 - To Boldly Go
item.description: Auntie Helena’s Wand (Wand of Paralysis), a scroll, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
To Boldly Go

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on February 28, 2019

A strange visitor has arrived in Thentia. Both the Council of Mages and Merchants are interested in speaking with him as things in Thentia have been a bit gloom. Once his business is concluded in town he’ll need an escort back home to the…Feywild. Part Ten of Song of Fates.

Items

  • Auntie Helena’s Wand (Wand of Paralysis) Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Blight Rare

Story Awards

Tarot of Fate (The Magician): Inverted

You thought it best to listen to Karasht and head to where the spores were most concentrated. Believing that you can overcome anything, you made a decision without hesitation.

Tarot of Fate (The Magician): Upright

You listened to Widar’s plea and decided to investigate Summer’s Lilly. No doubt your skills will be needed in the future to help with what you saw.

Touched by Fate

Many Powers circle around Thentia, and the Moonsea searching for lost magical artifacts. For whatever reason, the Fates have chosen you to be involved.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON2-2 - Army of the Unseen
item.description: Longbow, +1, a potion, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Army of the Unseen

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Baldman Games on February 27, 2019

Little more than an outpost, Dynnegall is the life-blood of resources that flow from Caer Moray, supporting Ffolk townships across the archipelago. But the supply boat is overdue by almost a tenday and hope is difficult to find. With the recent attacks repelled an opportunity exists to send aid, but who dares to venture outside the walls?

Items

  • Longbow, +1 Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

Story Awards

Dreams of Prophecy

The maddening impulse to write the words echoing in your head has long faded, but that doesn’t stop them from visiting your dreams along with visions of dark woods and whispered chants.

“An eye turns in the mist as dark blood boils and churns. Vengeance and rippling death will quake through the noblest fey. Endless shadows will howl as reality unbinds, crying to the darkness that waits in veiled lands.”

Hero of Dynnegall

Wrapped in a silver ribbon with a red seal is a letter from Earl Orwin Rhys himself, acknowledging your heroic deeds at Dynnegall. The letter has little value but is sure to provide bragging rights at any tavern in Moray.

Farmstead - Dynnegall, Moray

Members of the Serifal Faithful are granted a deed to the farmstead. The farmstead includes a four-room farmhouse, a small stable with an adjoining paddock, a wagon, five acres of farmland, one horse, two pigs, and five sheep, along with two farmers to tend the property and work the land. This is a Tier 1 property.

item.title: DDAL00-08 - Layers Upon Layers
item.description: Boots of False Tracks, Sending Stones, and 6 scrolls
item.content:encoded:
Layers Upon Layers

Season Agnostic Adventure for Tiers 1 and 2 Released on February 16, 2019

During the liberation of Szith Morcane, the factions found an unlikely friend in an agent of evil. Now, that alliance has been put to the test—and the factions are in search of souls brave (or foolish) enough to venture to the mysterious depths of the Feywild in order to uphold their end of the alliance! Grab your planar forks—there’s adventuring to be done!

Items

  • Boots of False Tracks Common
  • Sending Stones Uncommon
  • 6 x Spell Scroll of Gentle Repose Uncommon
